Question: This person asked Lord Beeching to take on the role, but he declined, advising This person to go back to making records.
Hints: ^ Note a: this person was responsible for 25 Billboard Hot 100 number one singles as performer, writer or co-writer.
This person released Rock 'n' Roll (1975), an album of cover songs, in February.
The Beatles evolved from this person's first band, the Quarrymen.
